title: STELLAR FUTURE
description: At Stellar Futures, they believe in building technology solutions that pave the way to a better climate-aware future.

title: TRAIAS GIL
description: Traias Gil is an e-commerce platform dedicated to showcasing and selling handmade leather belts and horse accessories of exceptional quality.

title: TRENDOO
description: Trendoo was invented as a trendy, avant garde fashion label known for its innovative designs and cutting-edge styles.

title: FOOD RECIPE APP
description: Say goodbye to food waste and hello to Foodie - your ultimate food app for using what you already have in your pantry!

title: PLANNER APP
description: A simple planner app that allows users to save events and tasks for the day or week.

title: QUIZ GAME
description: The quiz game comprises five questions centered around general knowledge.

title: WEATHER DASHBOARD
description: A comprehensive weather forecast application that displays both the current weather and a 5-day forecast.

title: EMPLOYEE INFORMATION
description: This application will gather information about employees on a software engineering team and generate an HTML webpage displaying summaries for each person.

title: BOOTSTRAP PORTFOLIO
description: Within this project, I've extensively explored the Bootstrap framework, meticulously crafting a responsive design adaptable across laptops and mobile devices.

title: TIC-TAC-TOE
description: Tic-Tac-Toe is a classic paper-and-pencil game that's been enjoyed by people of all ages for generations.

title: INVESTMENT CALCULATOR
description: The app provides tools and features that enable users to track their investment performance, analyze market trends, and make informed decisions to achieve their financial goals.
